overview:
Founder & CEO of Raditaz, LLC. Raditaz is the first smart internet radio platform for mobile phones and the web and represents the future of radio. With Raditaz users can tag stations, share stations and songs and utilize a location layer that allows users to discover music based on whatâ€™s trending in various regions around the US. With our 14 million songs, users can create their own custom stations or listen to our professionally curated stations. Through geo-targeting on smart phones, we have the ability to know when and where users are listening enabling us to target advertising.

Previously, Tom was CFO of Survey Sampling international, LLC. Tom was also CFO of Interactive Search Network prior to its sale to Ask Jeeves. Interactive Search owned iwon.com and the search properties, My Search and My Web Search. Tom was CFO of Promotions.com (NASDAQ PRMO) prior to Interactive Search. Prior to Promotions.com, Tom was VP of Finance of Health Partners, Inc., a physician practice management outfit that was sold in 1997. Tom began his career with 6 years at Deloitte & Touche.
